N60,000 Monthly.

Public Relations Officer Job at JV Management Consulting




        
    

        
        JV Management Consulting is passionate about supporting businesses across Africa in order to help businesses achieve sustainable growth . With a team of experts and a wealth of experience, we specialise in providing innovative management solutions that empower organisations to thrive in today's dynamic and ever-evolving business landscape.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Public Relations Officer
Job Location: Achara, Enugu
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Our client in the real estate sector is seeking a proactive and articulate Public Relations Officer to manage brand image, handle communications, and strengthen public engagement.
	The ideal candidate will help build positive relationships with clients, stakeholders, and the general public.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement PR strategies to enhance brand visibility
	Draft press releases, marketing content, and communication materials
	Manage media relations and respond to public or media inquiries
	Coordinate promotional events and public engagement activities
	Monitor industry trends and manage the company’s online presence


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Communications, Marketing, Public Relations, or a related field (added advantage)
	1- 2 years of experience in public relations, communications, or related roles
	Strong writing, communication, and interpersonal skills
	Ability to represent the company professionally across various platforms.


Salary
N60,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jvmcrecruitment@gmail.com using “PRO Application – Enugu” as the subject of the mail.
